itemDisplayName: Multiple Ubuntu 14.04 VMs with memcached service and one VM with Apache and PHP test page
description: This template creates one or more Ubuntu 14.04 VMs in a private-only subnet and install and configures memcached service. It also creates one publicly accessible Apache VM with a PHP test page to confirm that memcached is installed and accessible.
summary: Multiple VMs in a private subnet with memcached and one publicly accessible VM with Apache test page.
